content: **crocheted bag in drops belle the piece is worked with granny squares and hexagons ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #frostedparcel drops design pattern vs-128 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference approx 56 cm height in middle approx 21 cm height of sides from middle of bottom without strap approx 30 cm **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150 g colour 26 pearl **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height on hook size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
